entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 6 except temperature steady near minus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning in the evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 6 except temperature steady near minus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022
